name: r/truscum
description:
The term "truscum" is a portmanteau of "true" and "scum" and is used to describe a specific viewpoint within the transgender community. Truscum individuals are those who believe that a person must experience gender dysphoria and undergo medical transition (such as hormone therapy or sex reassignment surgery) to be considered truly transgender. Some believe that non-binary identies are not recognised as a valid gender.

[Entry edited under discussion with member of the trans community, please discuss an edit on our discord]
